eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maryland; AT 11:00 PM ON OCT 28, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:00 AM OCT 29, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Maryland Department of Emergency Management with the coordinated test of the Emergency Alert System. Broadcasters are testing equipment used to warn the public during an emergency. This concludes the test of the Emergency Alert System.
